name: cZUI
short_description:
cZUI is a Zoomable User Interface framework, allowing the creation of zoomable interfaces in C++. It uses the scene graph concept, with the possibility of panning and zooming cameras on various parts of the scene. Multiple cameras can be painted on the same window, each with its own painting rectangle.

Multiple demos and a tutorial are available.
